Description:
Brand new bordering Berwick Ready to move in!!!
**PLEASE CALL FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION**
An exciting opportunity to secure this wonderful custom designed House that offers comfort and space, Ready to Move in Now!!!
This home with high ceilings offers professionally landscaped front and backyards, four generous bedrooms, master featuring walk in robe and lavish ensuite, remaining three bedroom with wardrobes, separate bathroom and toilet, a formal lounge, spacious open plan living, dining finished with well appointed kitchen fitted with 900mm five burner cooktop, oven and ragehood, dishwasher, stone benchtops and large walk in pantry.
For your convenience, this home comes with
Coloured concrete to driveway
Fencing
Front and back landscaping
Clothesline
Letterbox
LED downlights to living areas
NBN ready
Holland blinds
Tiles to Wet areas, Kitchen, Meals, Living & Pantry & Rear Hallway
Carpet floor coverings to the balance of the home
2590mm ceiling heights
900mm Rangehood & Cooktop Appliances to Kitchen
600mm stainless oven & dishwasher
Remote Control Sectional Garage Door
Flyscreens to all openable windows and flywire to selected doors
Premium 3 coat paint system to walls
Tiled shower bases to Ensuite & Bathroom
Your new home in 2020 is located in short drive to
- Hillcrest College
- Rivercrest Christian schools
- Grayling Primary School (public school)
- Future Berwick Waters Town centre
- Future state primary and secondary school
- Cardinia Creek
- Casey hospital
- Casey central shopping centre
- Eden rise village shopping centre
- Berwick & Beaconsfield railway station
- Monash Freeway Access
- Berwick Chase Primary School.
- Kambrya College
- St Francis Xavier College, Beaconsfield Campus
- Berwick College
Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 or Madhawa Hewawasam on 0426 659 974 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
Sleek, Contemporary Style in the Livingston Estate
Primed for immediate family enjoyment opposite a children's playground, this glorious Livingston Estate residence has been sleekly designed with careful consideration given to its low-maintenance lifestyle agenda.
- Four robed bedrooms including a master suite with walk-through-robe to stylish ensuite, supplemented by a family bathroom, separate toilet and full-sized laundry
- Taking pride of place at the front of the home, the lounge room is enriched with plush carpeting underfoot
- Awash with glorious sunshine due to its northerly orientation, the open plan kitchen, meals and family room incorporates stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, soft-close cabinetry and a convenient breakfast bench
- Stunning porcelain tiles flow throughout, accompanied with carpeting to all bedrooms
- Compact rear yard offers the ideal space for outdoor relaxation or as a terrific play space for children
- Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, Colorbond fence plus double garage with internal access
Presenting the perfect setting to inspire happy family memories, within walking distance to Casey Fields Primary, Cranbourne Secondary, Casey Grammar, Casey RACE & Casey Fields sporting facilities & Cranbourne Shopping Centre, close to trains plus major road arterials.
Photo ID is required at the open homes

Description:
PRICE REDUCED TO SELL- MAKE AN OFFER
APPOINTMENTS TO INSPECT NOT AVAILABLE UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.
This incredible home is PACKED with features and will surely tick all the boxes! Highlights include TWO living areas to enjoy, an outdoor alfresco all your friends will be envious of and to top it off double side access for those who need to store a caravan, boat or trailer. Found in the popular and established Brookland Greens Estate at the end of a quiet court ensures peaceful living and all amenities at your fingertips.
Main features include:
Spacious Master suite complete with walk in robe and en-suite.
Three further bedrooms all serviced by built in robes
TWO living areas to enjoy a formal lounge as you walk into the home and an open plan family room at the rear
Central kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar and plenty of bench and cupboard space
Family bathroom with separate toilet
HUGE outdoor entertaining area with built in BBQ and chimenea fireplace perfect for entertaining all year round
Great sized backyard for kids and pets to play
Double garage with internal access PLUS double side access for truck, trailers, boats or caravan. Great for boys toys or tradie as truck and tools can be secured behind lockable gates.
EXTRAS include - ducted central heating and evaporative cooling, downlights throughout, ceiling fans to all bedrooms and living areas, quality timber floorboards, recently fully painted and new handbasins in all bathrooms, rainwater tank and loads more!
Ideally located in a peaceful and quite location in the highly desirable Brookland Greens Estate, this family-friendly neighbourhood offers a lot of opportunity and great amenities. Only a few blocks away is the Brookland Greens Reserve featuring a children's playground and plenty of space to kick the footy. The new Cranbourne West Shopping complex is also only a short drive away offering a supermarket as well as other specialty stores. Transport is a breeze being a short distance to the M1 and Cranbourne Train Station and there are multiple schools in proximity for all your schooling needs.
Please contact our team to arrange your private inspection before it's gone!
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions in the content and photos are approximate only. ***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS***
Due diligence check list: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
BRAND NEW MODERN HOUSE IN CRANBOURNE EAST
Located in Cranbourne East and carefully designed to suit family life style and close to Shopping Centre, retail shops, restaurant, cafes, gym, medical centre.
Comprising a master bedroom with walk in robes & private bathroom with double vanity. Three more bedrooms with built in robes and a main bathroom. A lounge to the front of house An open plan expansive living, dining complemented with 900mm stainless steel kitchen, which includes pantry and stone benchtop. Journey outside to large backyard to entertain with family and friends.
Other features include
- Ducted heating
- 900mm Five burner Cooktop
- 900mm Oven
- Front and rear landscaping
- Remote control panel lift garage with internal access to house
- Fully fenced
- Downlights
- Elegant floor tiles
- Quality Carpets to Bedrooms
Centrally located within modern day amenities, schools, parks, public transport, walking distance to Casey Fields, Casey Race, Casey fields Primary School, community centre, Child care centres and future shops, Short drive to Casey Grammar School, Cranbourne park Shopping Centre, Hunt Club Village, Shopping on Clyde, Australian Gardens, and Cranbourne Train Station.
First Home Buyers Grant is still available Subject to State Revenue Office Approval.
Please note* Photos are for illustrator purposes only.
Call Nitin on 0432 426 688 to schedule a private inspection.

Description:
Modern Family Dream in the Tulliallan Estate
Internet:
Standout design, substantial space and a full-size backyard define this 4-year young home, delivering the modern family dream in the newly established Tulliallan Estate.
Bathed in natural sunlight, it features an expansive open family and dining room - linking up with a stylish kitchen that contains stainless steel appliances, black stone benches, white cabinetry and tiled splashbacks. Seamlessly synced to outside, a large grassed backyard with vegetable garden will be adored by children, pets and those who enjoy growing their own produce. A master bedroom with ensuite plus a laundry with remote double garage access completes the ground floor.
Upstairs, a second living/entertaining area is flanked by three additional robed bedrooms and a sleek common bathroom. Including a second master suite with walk-in wardrobe and ensuite.
Quality extras include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling plus generous storage throughout.
With plenty of lifestyle benefits for the family, the property boasts close proximity to buses, parks/playgrounds, The Avenue Shopping Village, Casey Central Shopping Centre, Tulliallan and St Catherine's Catholic Primary Schools, St Francis Xavier College and childcare centres.

Description:
Low Maintenance Family Home
Are you Looking for a great value established family home in the coastal villages? Well then look no further than 5 Heron Close to find an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage, open plan dining/ living with wood fire, a central bathroom, study, sunroom, and three generous bedrooms all with built-in robes and master with updated ensuite.
Behind the double car garage is where this property comes to life with a second living area, powder room & man cave with a bar that opens on to the large covered alfresco area with spa perfect for entertaining.
Features of the home
Vaulted Ceilings
Woodfire
Split system heating and cooling
Floorboards
Ceiling Fans
Double glazing throughout
Landscaped Gardens
Updated kitchen
Evaporative cooling
The features are endless an inspection is a must!
Located within walking distance to the local general store, boat ramps, foreshore, and bush walking tracks, while remaining only a short drive to local schools (Tooradin, Pearcedale) and short drive into Cranbourne shopping precinct.
Contact your #coastalvillagespecialist to arrange an inspection today

Description:
NEAT AND COSY IN QUARTERS!
CRANBOURNE WEST - QUARTERS ESTATE - If you are looking for a property that offers outstanding value for money with nothing to do but move in, you have come to the right address. This perfectly presented home is appealing for first home buyers, downsizers or investors.
This home offers contemporary neutral tones complementing the open plan living with an abundance of natural light and West facing.
Kitchen overlooks the meals area which leads out to a decked entertaining area perfect for those summer BBQs. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, range hood, dishwasher, walk-in pantry and microwave cavity to name a few.
Spacious master bedroom with full ensuite and walk-in robe, the other 2 true to size bedrooms both with built-in robes and shared family bathroom.
Easy to care for front and rear yards are perfect for kids or pets to play and enjoy year round.
Features include:
- Ducted heating and split system cooling
- Double lock-up garage with internal and rear access
- Easy to care for front and rear yards
- Floating boards
- Pendant lighting
- Walking distance to wetlands and parklands
The location is second to none with easy access to Western Port Highway, which leads to all of the established amenities on offer in the popular suburbs of Cranbourne, Carrum Downs, Lyndhurst, Hampton Park and Dandenong! Cranbourne is the gateway to the Mornington Peninsula with an abundance of wineries, whilst a relaxing weekend down at Philip Island will always be on the cards!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTIONS!

Description:
State of the Art Living!
Built to the highest quality by multiple award winning builder Porter Davis, the moment you arrive at this home you will be drawn in by the elegance and grace, no expense has been spared offering the highest quality fixtures and fittings in a dream location.
Stepping inside you'll find laminate timber flooring flowing through the home, a front study and front formal living area are just the start of this spacious family home. The hub of downstairs is the open plan living integrating kitchen - dining - lounge into one. A naturally light filled kitchen offers stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including oven, cook top, rangehood and dishwasher. There is plenty of cupboard space and walk in pantry.
Walking up the timber stairs with glass railing will give you the feeling of entering a five star hotel, once at the top you'll find a third living zone with plenty of space for a big couch and large TV. The oversized master bedroom offers walk in robe plus ensuite, bedroom two features a walk in robe, whilst bedrooms three and four both have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom.
Other internal features include downstairs powder room, internal access from the double plus extra car garage on remote which also offers a rear access roller door to the backyard, internal laundry, evaporative cooling, ducted heating plus high quality fixtures and fittings.
Enjoy the private surrounds of your outside entertaining area with the under roof space covering the timber decking, a low maintenance garden compliments a busy lifestyle.
Situated in the highly sought after Cicra estate, enjoy the best of what Clyde North and Berwick has to offer with close proximity to prestigious schools, Casey Central & Eden Rise shopping centres, public transport, medical and sporting facilities. All the hard work has been done with a high quality finish in a great location, don't miss your chance to take this opportunity!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised. If you prefer to view by Private Inspection please click the 'Book Inspection' button to register your preferred inspection or contact the agent to organize a suitable time. The health and safety of our clients and staff is paramount and we are closely following the advice of the Australian Government and World Health Organisation.

Features Include

An opportunity to secure this fantastic well maintained two living , three bedder located in a vibrant and modern and ever expansive community here in Cranbourne West. This well positioned family home wraps up all the essentials into an ideal space, offering the important things in a community - family, space, lifestyle and location.

Address: 21 Yellow Robin Circuit Cranbourne East VIC 3977
Description:
WHAT DREAMS ARE MADE OF
CRANBOURNE EAST: Set on a block of approximately 375 SQMS is this massive opportunity to secure the best home in the best street in Cranbourne East. Its location is second to none and the amenities around this home is a purchasers delight. Schools, play grounds, sports fields, shopping, etc you wouldn't fall short of any.
With a lovely facade up the front and well cared for front yard, you will be mesmerized the moment you step into this home. The grand entrance leads you along a walkway with the master bedroom located to the left of the home which comes with a FES and a WIR.
As you progress through the walkway you are then greeted by this amazing open plan kitchen, dining and family living area. The kitchen is so modern its a chef's delight, with plenty of counter top space, Caesar stone bench tops, a lot of storage, quality appliances, free standing oven, range hood, dishwasher, large fridge cavity with plumbing connected.
The open plan dining and family living area is spacious and overlooks the kitchen which is so ideal when entertaining. The remaining two robed bedrooms are situated to the left of the home alongside the master bedroom and well-serviced by the family shower and toilet.
If entertaining is your forte then the attached alfresco with access from the living zone is a must see. With mature plants, an awesome water feature and deck lights, its just such a tranquil setting to come to after a tiring day.
All of this and a lot more on 375 SQMS, you will surely be spoilt for choice
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT PRIVATE INSPECTIONS***
At Ray White Cranbourne, our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favorable conditions.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
